channel.title: Web Dev on Le murmure de Julian
channel.description: Recent content in Web Dev on Le murmure de Julian

item.title: [筆記] Self published B2G app
item.description: B2G並未一定要開發者把應用程式發表到一個特別的app store, 網站也可以自行加一個install按鍵, 讓使用者把你的網站當應用程式裝到手機內 首先,

item.title: [筆記] Practice: Open graph with Facebook JavaScript API
item.description: Source: https://bitbucket.org/julianshen/videomag/overview Demo URL:http://growing-wind-8625.herokuapp.com/top Server: Play framework 2.0 on Heroku Open graph object: Youtube video, Action: watch It’s not a problem to add youtube video since it already contains open graph meta data in page. All we have to do is call “/me/video.watches?video=youtube_link” with POST. To post activity to timeline, the permission “publish_actions” is required. The result on timeline:

item.title: [筆記] "Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL" error with Facebook Javascript API
item.description: The following example shows how to create a simple Facebook login button with Facebook javascript API: Normally, this page would be reloaded if user finished authorized your app. But it won’t be reloaded in Chrome due to the follwing error: Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL https://s-static.ak.fbcdn.net/connect/xd_proxy.php?version=3#cb=f363e58d9&origin=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ab.com%2Ffcb27588&relation=opener&transport=postmessage&frame=fac4c0f18&access_token=AAAEHZBpoK3B0BALv8Cf96gaKEnn4ZBtXgjCOQCFFhVDL4K0rZAE2NGDcqZCPlZByNNKEDmYSGKHQv8jAUM2yGZCHkOcyXUKhoZD&expires_in=0&signed_request=g7sYd_XQx-EBPtQQGk-0ISRMrUDnT4L4WHAmlNsVFBU. from frame with URL http://www.ab.com/login.html. Domains, protocols and ports must match. Some people use FB.getLoginStatus() to check if user authorized app

item.title: [筆記] Connect java client to a node.js server with Thrift
item.description: Thrift是由Facebook開發的一套RPC system, 廣泛的被很多軟體應用, 像是HBase, Hadoop, Cassandra… 也支援了許多語言 , 可以跨語言做RPC 但&hell

item.title: [筆記] Sencha Touch + Facebook Graph API
item.description: Sencha Touch 2.0在OO的包裝上做的還算不錯, 把MVC的角色切分的還蠻清楚的, 以List為例, 大概就像這樣: 但它的document實在很糟糕, 光看他

item.title: [筆記] Tabs on JQuery Mobile and Sencha touch
item.description: JQuery mobile跟Sencha touch都是蠻完整的mobile web framework, 兩者各有擅長, 比較起來以開發的角度我比較喜歡JQuery所標榜的&quot

item.title: [筆記] Building social networking service with DIASPORA* on Heroku
item.description: Looks familiar? It’s not Google+. It’s DIASPORA. An open source project that implements a distributed social networking service. This project was announced on APRIL 24, 2010 (Just right after Facebook f8 2010 that is at APRIL 21). Alpha version was released at NOV 23, 2010 (two days before my birthday :P). According to this, Mark Zuckerbug also donated to it just because it’s a cool idea. It’s built on Ruby

item.title: [筆記] Touch Draw with in HTML5
item.description: – 前言 – Safari2Phone做兩天就膩了(天呀, 我無可救藥), 昨天想到玩點別的 第一階段目標, 用"<canvas>&

item.title: [Safari Extension] Safari2Phone
item.description: 其實這是我自己無聊寫的啦, 這是我第一隻Safari Extension, 不過我不打算publish到Safari extension網站, 放這邊就好, 請點此下載 這

item.title: 開發Safari Extension (之一)
item.description: 現在的Browser好像不開放給人家掛一些外掛就落伍了, 大部分的Desktop Browser也都有提供這樣的功能, Apple的Safari也

item.title: 很久之前無聊寫的Chrome Extension
item.description: Chrome Extension其實還蠻簡單的, 之前無聊試寫了一個, 其實也不是啥大東西, 就只是去氣象局抓張最新的衛星雲圖回來 沒啥code, 隨便把它開放出

item.title: [筆記] 產生 Web page thumbnail (續前篇)
item.description: 在前篇提到利用CutyCapt來產生Web page thumbnail, 不過畢竟CutyCapt是C++寫的, build出來也是一個執行檔, 寫完上一篇就有股衝動想用P

item.title: [筆記] 產生 Web page thumbnail
item.description: 剛突然想弄一個可以產生Web page thumbnail的service 第一個想到的是能不能用Webkit做一個, 不過, 自己寫, 有點太麻煩了, 想說應

item.title: A pattern learned from memcached
item.description: 晚上快速翻了一變 memcached , 想了一些想法, 趁還沒忘之前先寫下來再去睡好了 memcahced的設計概念說實在的簡單到不行, 說簡單不是說他不好或是沒什麼

item.title: [筆記] Embed Youtube player
item.description: 以往嵌入Youtube video到網頁中要貼一大堆醜醜的object tag像是: <object width=“640” height=“385”><param name=“movie” value=“http://www.youtube.com/v/VIDEO_ID?fs=1&amp;hl=zh_TW”></param><param name=“allowFullScreen” value=“true”></param><param name=“allowscriptaccess” value=“always”></param><embed src=“http://www.youtube.com/v/VIDEO_ID?fs=1&amp;hl=zh_TW” type=“application/x-shockwave-flash” allowscriptaccess=“always” allowfullscreen=“true” width=“640” height=“385”></embed></object> 後來股溝大神….
